title: Roscoe Wallace, Serena Williams, Marvel Comics, Halle Berry, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Sheryl Underwood, Reality Update, Dating Question, Carmelo Anthony and more.
itunes:title: Roscoe Wallace, Serena Williams, Marvel Comics, Halle Berry, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Sheryl Underwood, Reality Update, Dating Question, Carmelo Anthony and more.
description:
Roscoe Wallace makes his presence known. Serena Williams is GQ's 'Woman' of the Year. Marvel and Tupac will collaborate. Halle Berry has a bond with the Los Angeles Rams. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Steve VS Tommy. Sheryl Underwood is back and she has something to say about CNN. Miss Carla brings us Reality Update. The crew has a discussion about love, lies and dating. Big Dog has is own story. Finally, we wrap up with a discussion about Carmelo Anthony and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
